parameters.name: search_filter
sort
parameters.description:
Sort is an optional HTTP parameter to sort results by.
Supported sort keys are: [created_at creator.email creator.name creator.username description kernel name script status updated_at].
where "+" means sort by ascending order, and "-" means sort by descending order.
For example:
  sort=-created_at.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
Page size is an optional argument for number of entries to return in one page.
If not specified, the server will determine a page size.
If specified, must be respecified for further requests when using the
provided next page token in the response.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description:
Page token is an optional argument for specifying which page of results to get.
If not specified, the first page will be returned, including a token for the next page.
Will be empty if there is no next page.

experiment_id.description: Experiment ID the run belongs to.

model_path.description: Model path of model that is getting registered to model registry.

schema.description:
CreateRegisteredModelRequest request to create a registered model.
If the model already exists a new version is added to the list of model versions.

schema.title: updateRegisteredModelRequest request to update a model's description
